item.description:
Let's explore Salem, there is always so much going on there I am sure that we can find some fun things to do, maybe we will take a guided tour, do some shopping, window shop or sit around and people watch, be prepared to have some FUN making new friends, and visiting with the ones you already know.

 

We will only wait 15 minutes for you to arrive at the meeting place, please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.

 

We look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the grassy area/walkway waiting.
item.name: Walk around Salem
